title: @djunct_4d_imager
description: The program is useful for viewing the same slice across the 'time' dimension of a 4D data set.

onescl_png.title: Onescale PNG Image
onescl_png.description: Output montage image with constant brightness range

sepscl_png.title: Sepscale PNG Image
sepscl_png.description: Output montage image with varying brightness range

onescl_mpeg.title: Onescale MPEG Movie
onescl_mpeg.description: Output movie with constant brightness range (one slice at a time)

sepscl_mpeg.title: Sepscale MPEG Movie
sepscl_mpeg.description: Output movie with varying brightness range (one slice at a time)

onescl_gif.title: Onescale AGIF
onescl_gif.description: Output animated GIF with constant brightness range (one slice at a time)

sepscl_gif.title: Sepscale AGIF
sepscl_gif.description: Output animated GIF with varying brightness range (one slice at a time)
